name: SEAMLESS_S_FUNC_UNIFORM_MCU2
steps: Step 1.: If both MCU_PARTIAL_UPDATE and AUTH_FAIL_ON_MCU_COMPONENT are 0, then the entire update was loaded successfully.

Step 2.: If MCU_PARTIAL_UPDATE is set to 1, then one or more MCU components failed to load. If AUTH_FAIL_ON_MCU_COMPONENT is also set to 1, then one or more components of the MCU failed authentication.
summary: Verify the IA32_MCU_STATUS MSR is configured correctly after late loading.
